TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed HelpNavigator extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies constants indicating which elements of the Help file to display.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Help> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> classes to provide access to specific elements of a Help file. For example, when used with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> component that provides F1 Help, the TopicId or Topic value could be specified to open Help to a context-specific topic.
## Examples The following code example displays a form with three buttons that can be used to interact with the mspaint.chm Help file. The **Show Help Index** button displays the **Index** tab for the Help file. The **Show Help** button displays content in the Help file based on the value selected in the **Help Navigator** list. The **Show Keyword** button displays content in the Help file based on the keyword specified in the **Keyword** text box.
For example, to show the Ovals Help page by the index value, select the KeywordIndex value in the **Help Navigator** drop-down list, type **ovals** in the **Parameter** text box, and then click the **Show Help** button. To show the "To paint with a brush" Help topic by the keyword, type **mspaint.chm::/paint_brush.htm** in the **Keyword** text box, and then click the **Show Keyword** button.
The example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Help.ShowHelp%2A> method to display the different Help tabs and Help topics, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Help.ShowHelpIndex%2A> method to display the Help index.
[!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.windows.forms.h_4_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.windows.forms.h_4_1.cs)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Help#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.windows.forms.h_4_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator AssociateIndex = int32(-2147483643)

Docs.summary: The Help file opens to the index entry for the first letter of a specified topic.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator Find = int32(-2147483644)

Docs.summary: The Help file opens to the search page.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator Index = int32(-2147483645)

Docs.summary: The Help file opens to the index.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator KeywordIndex = int32(-2147483642)

Docs.summary: The Help file opens to the topic with the specified index entry, if one exists; otherwise, the index entry closest to the specified keyword is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator TableOfContents = int32(-2147483646)

Docs.summary: The Help file opens to the table of contents.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator Topic = int32(-2147483647)

Docs.summary: The Help file opens to a specified topic, if the topic exists.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.HelpNavigator TopicId = int32(-2147483641)

Docs.summary: The Help file opens to a topic indicated by a numeric topic identifier.
